block.description: The option to adjust the width of the button to its parent width
block.description_zh: 将按钮宽度调整为其父宽度的选项

ghost.description: Ghost property to make the button background transparent
ghost.description_zh: 幽灵属性，使按钮背景透明

href.description: Click on the address of the jump, specifying that the behavior of this property button is the same as that of the A link
href.description_zh: 点击跳转的地址，指定此属性 button 的行为和 a 链接一致

htmlType.description: Set the native 'type' value of 'button', please refer to [HTML standard] (https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/button#attr-type) for optional values.
htmlType.description_zh: 设置 `button` 原生的 `type` 值，可选值请参考 [HTML 标准](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/button#attr-type)

icon.description: Sets the icon type for the button

target.description: The target attribute is equivalent to a link, which takes effect when the href exists
target.description_zh: 相当于 a 链接的 target 属性，href 存在时生效

type.type: primary | ghost | dashed | link | text | default

events.name: click
events.description: Callback when the button is clicked
